name: Cows Milk
description: Organic milk from green grass fed Jersey cows

name: Bovine Colostrum
description: Colostrum is the earliest milk produced by the cow and is unique in its composition of essential nutrients, immune factors, and oligosaccharides

name: Yogurt
description: Yogurts can be high in protein, calcium, vitamins, and live culture, or probiotics, which can enhance the gut microbiota

name: Butter
description: Butter is a dairy product made from the fat and protein components of churned cream

name: Cheese
description: Cheese is a dairy product produced in wide ranges of flavors, textures, and forms by coagulation of the milk protein casein

name: Custard
description: Custard is a variety of culinary preparations based on sweetened milk, cheese, or cream cooked with egg or egg yolk to thicken it, and sometimes also flour, corn starch, or gelatin

name: Country Chicken Eggs
description: Eggs naturally contain vitamin D. The Country Hen eggs contain over three times the vitamin D of an average egg

name: Turkey Eggs
description: Turkey eggs are a good source of B vitamins, and vitamins B12 and B9 (folate) in particular. They are also rich in vitamin A and iron

name: Guinea Fowl Eggs
description: Guinea eggs are high in protein, rich in fat (the good kind), have a low value of carbohydrates, rich in calcium, and have a high value of zinc

name: Geese Eggs
description: Goose eggs are excellent sources of many nutrients such as protein, iron, omega-3 fats and vitamins A, B and folate, good sources of vitamin D and fair sources of calcium

name: Palmyra Fruit
